Original: 我總是對那些全是 5 星評論的地方持懷疑態度，所以我帶著一點薯條進來了，並希望真正看看這個地方是否就是所有這些和一袋薯條。我從所有酒吧的碼尺開始，只是為了看看它們如何衡量……一種老式的方式。調酒師把它從公園裡拿出來了。為了看看這是否是僥倖，我接下來喝了一杯海明威代基里酒，而我的妻子則在調配她的麥泰酒。他們倆都很出色。這個地方是一顆寶石。調酒師真的知道他在做什麼。他小心翼翼地混合，它的表現和味道都是如此。這將是每次訪問台北的常規停留！
EN: I always have doubts about those places that are all 5 -star comments, so I came in with a little fries, and hoped to see if this place is all these and a bag of fries.I started from the ruler of all bars, just to see how they measured ... an old -fashioned way.The bartender took it out of the park.In order to see if this was lucky, I drank a glass of Hemingwell's wine next, while my wife was preparing her Mattel.Both of them are excellent.This place is a gem.The bartender really knows what he is doing.He mixed carefully, and its performance and taste are the same.This will be a conventional stay every time you visit Taipei!

EN: I swear that this is one of the best cocktail bars in the world!We have been here for more than three years, and I still have not found the best Japanese whiskey cocktail anywhere!Unfortunately, I didn't save any photos!This is a cool place!Recommended strongly!

絕對推薦！
EN:

Absolutely recommended!

Original:
喜歡這個地方——氣氛、服務、洛菲音樂播放清單都很到位。他們的 5 星級評級並沒有讓人失望。如果你在台北隻能去一家酒吧，那應該就是這家了。

這個概念很簡單——沒有菜單，你可以點一杯經典雞尾酒、一杯客製化雞尾酒，或只是點一杯酒吧裡的任何飲料。他們的訂製雞尾酒是我喝過的最好的。
EN:
I like this place -atmosphere, service, and Loufei music playlist are in place.Their 5 -star rating is not disappointing.If you can only go to one bar in Taipei, it should be this one.

This concept is simple -without menu, you can order a cup of classic cocktails, a cup of customer -made cocktails, or just order any drink in a bar.Their custom cocktail is the best I have ever drank.

Original:
這家酒吧改變了我對台北雞尾酒文化的看法。最初我對這座城市的大多數雞尾酒吧都很失望，幾乎放棄了尋找一家好的雞尾酒吧的想法，但我對這家的品質感到非常驚訝。我知道 5 星評論看起來像是一個騙局，對於這座城市的許多其他酒吧來說，情況往往如此，但這家酒吧實際上是相當合法的

首先，酒吧工作人員技術精湛，知識淵博。技術熟練意味著他們的動作是經過練習和有意的；當他們攪拌飲料時，你不會聽到任何聲音，當他們搖晃時，他們對不同類型的飲料有不同的搖晃技術和搖酒器。他們總是在上菜前進行品嚐，並且對冰的稀釋度非常精確。這些小細節很重要。此外，他們對酒類和雞尾酒的了解很到位，所以如果你根據自己的喜好要求推薦，他們可以為你調出一杯不錯的、有意義的飲料。調酒師往往也有更大的抱負，即希望有一天能開設自己的商店，因此比其他酒吧的典型兼職人員工作更勤奮。這裡的人們把調酒當作一種職業，而不僅僅是一份副業，並努力每天變得更好。

店主也是個很酷的傢伙。一位半退休的商人顯然買了太多瓶優質威士忌，卻找不到處理掉它們的方法，他決定開一家酒吧，這樣他就可以擺脫庫存。他是一個非常慷慨的人，免費向我提供了幾張他收藏的照片，而且還是一個非常健談的人。在一個安靜的夜晚，他只是和他的妻子在吧台休息，所以我們聊了一下。我要提一下，酒吧老闆對他的員工非常嚴格；他會點基本的飲料，然後向他的員工詢問知識，即為什麼你用這種威士忌而不是另一種威士忌作為基礎，並教導他的員工如何使用適當的酒來調製正確的飲料，而你不太明白這一點經常。他們對酒精的了解令人印象深刻，這不僅體現在他們對新飲品的創造力，也體現在他們對經典飲品細節的關注

整體氛圍還可以。安靜安靜的酒吧，沒什麼特別的。我認為如果他們把氣氛弄得更暗一點的話，氣氛會更好，但這是一個安靜的工作日晚上，所以我不知道這是否與此有關。

總的來說，我很享受我的經驗。這裡的飲料品質很高，會推薦給任何想要找到一杯漂亮雞尾酒的人
EN:
This bar changed my view of the Taipei cocktail culture.At first I was disappointed with most cocktail bars in the city, and I almost gave up the idea of ​​looking for a good cocktail bar, but I was very surprised by this quality.I know the 5 -star comment looks like a scam. For many other bars in this city, the situation is often the case, but this bar is actually quite legal.

First of all, the bar staff has exquisite skills and knowledgeable knowledge.Skills of technology means that their movements are practiced and intentional; when they stirring drinks, you will not hear any sound. When they shake, they have different shaking technology and wine shakes on different types of beverages.They always taste it before serving, and the dilution of ice is very accurate.These small details are important.In addition, they have a good understanding of alcohol and cocktails, so if you recommend it according to your preferences, they can call you a good and meaningful drink for you.The bartender often has greater ambitions, that is, he hopes to open his own store one day, so he work more diligent than the typical part -time personnel of other bars.People here take bartending as a profession, not just a sideline, but also trying to become better every day.

The owner is also a cool guy.A semi -retired businessman obviously bought too many bottles of high -quality whiskey, but could not find a way to deal with them. He decided to open a bar so he could get rid of the inventory.He is a very generous person who provides me with a few photos of his collection for free, and is a very talkative person.On a quiet night, he just resting with his wife at the bar, so we talked.I want to mention that the bar owner is very strict with his employees; he will order basic drinks, and then ask his employees to ask his knowledge, that is, why you use this whiskey instead of another whiskey as the foundation and teach his employees How to use appropriate wine to prepare the correct drink, and you don't quite understand this.Their understanding of alcohol is impressive, which is not only reflected in their creativity of new drinks, but also in their attention to the details of classic drinks

The overall atmosphere is okay.The quiet and quiet bar, nothing special.I think that if they make the atmosphere darker, the atmosphere will be better, but this is a quiet night night, so I don't know if this is related to this.

Overall, I enjoy my experience.The quality of the beverages here is very high, and it will be recommended to anyone who wants to find a beautiful cocktail

EN: The first -class cocktail bar is comparable to the best cocktail bar in the world.Modern and warm decoration.Sean mixed the drink very well -top -level raw materials, fashionable craftsmanship, excellent balanced drinks.Captive our preferences to make customized drinks.
